**Summary**
• An Ethereum Initial Coin Offering (ICO) whale, dormant for three years, has staked $646 million worth of ETH.
• The movement reactivates a wallet that participated in the 2015 Ethereum ICO.
• The substantial staking event could influence market dynamics and investor sentiment.
• The whale's decision to stake after a long period of inactivity suggests renewed confidence in Ethereum's long-term prospects.

**Why it matters**
• Signals potential confidence in Ethereum's future, possibly encouraging further investment.
• Indicates a major player's belief in the profitability of staking, which could drive more participation in Ethereum's proof-of-stake mechanism.

**Risks**
• Large staking actions can increase centralization risks within the Ethereum network.

**Opportunities**
• Could lead to increased stability and security of the Ethereum network through higher staking participation.

**Market view**
Market — Positive signal for Ethereum, potentially attracting more investors and increasing market confidence.

**Sources**
https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/ethereum-ico-whale-stakes-usd600m-after-three-years-dormant
